data.title: Amazing design and beauty
data.text:
The design house isn't just your run of the mill place to pick up a gift . And not just a house, but a home filled with anything that your mind and heart could wish to be designed for yourself or someone special. These beautifully designed pieces when worn make a statement and are eye catching to everyone. The artist and designer Linda is such a beautiful graceful lady and just has this way of knowing what your looking for and if she hasn't already designed it she will design it for you. The sweet ladies who work here are so helpful and take time to show you everything . I have bought several gorgeous pieces,
My favorite is the beautiful coin pendants, and the freshwater pearl leather collection and numerous other gifts for my family and friends. This is the only place I would suggest if your looking  for that something special for someone special that will create a forever gift.

data.title: Exquisite Jewelry
data.text: Whether you are looking for a beautiful custom designed piece of jewelry or a unique gift for someone special, Design House is the place to shop.  This is jewelry unlike anything else you can find in Waco.

data.title: Beautiful pieces
data.text: Beautifully designed and hand made pieces of artwork to wear.  They also carry many unique designer pieces.  This is the perfect place to shop for someone who has everything.  You will be able to get unique items that no one else has.

data.title: One of a kind artistry!
data.text:
I bought a silver and alabaster piece with a sapphire stone, and I get compliments on it all the time! 
The artist/jeweler is there behind the counter, and she is so helpful and sweet. 
There are very reasonable (inexpensive) prices all the way up to the very pricey, but no pushy sales at all.
For a one-of-a-kind, artistic design and a custom look, you wont find anything better in Waco!

data.title: Stunning Jewelry!
data.text: I LOVE this jewelry!!! The designer is actually there all of the time and you can talk with her about custom pieces or just a quick gift! I always pick up a special piece when I'm in town. See you next time!

data.title: So beautiful,so artistic!
data.text: I stumbled on this studio while visiting Sironia on Austin ave.  They actually make the jewelry right in front of you!  They were very engaging & helpful - not stuffy at all...I tried on a gorgeous opal pendant...I will definitely be back!
